tool_description: Determines soil texture classification based on sand, silt, and clay percentages, providing insights into drainage, water retention, and nutrient holding capacity.
error_messages: Invalid particle percentages: All percentages must be between 0 and 100.
Percentages don't sum to 100: Sand, silt, and clay percentages must total 100%.
Missing particle data: All three particle size percentages are required.
usage: Provide sand_percent, silt_percent, and clay_percent. Ensure all three values sum to 100%.

management_considerations.description: Special management needs for this texture
